overview:
Dirk oversees the strategic direction of ADTECH, an international leader of digital marketing solutions that offers publishers, ad networks and agencies an integrated ad management solution for display, video and mobile advertising. Since taking on the role in 2005, the company has increased the companyâ€™s annual revenue by 50% each year, in addition to bringing on more than 700 global clients in the United States, Australia, South Africa, Asia, Thailand and others.

Developed ADTECH from an European company to an global operating business and transformed ADTECH from an independent company to a part of AOL/Time Warner.

In charge for AOL Advertising Product Management and Technology to connect the resources and develop better ad products for the industry.
